filterOperatorMustNotContainYield: Filter operator must not contain yield.
filterOperatorMustNotContainAwait: Filter operator must not contain await.
modifierNotAllowedHere: $modifier modifier not allowed at this definition.
functionMustNotContainAwait: This function must not contain await.
functionMustNotContainYield: This function must not contain yield.
illegalRequiredParameter: Required parameter must not appear after optional parameters.
constructorMustNotSpecifyResultType: Constructor must not specify result type.
yieldMustAppearWithinBlock: Yield operations must appear within block.
awaitMustAppearWithinBlock: Await operations must appear within block.
